name: Maze Fever (itch)
description:
Try to get out of mazes in first person.

To Do:

  • Add multiple levels (Added)
  • Add Some kind of enemy that will kill you if he finds you
  • Add Scary sounds to make game more interesting (Added on hardmode but still working on it)
  • Add multiple gamemodes (Added!)

Gamemodes:

  1. Hard you only have a flashlight (Added!)
  2. Medium you have a map to help you get through levels (Added!)
  3. Easy Signs to lead you towards the exit (Added!)

Suggest what you think would be cool if it was in this game.

Note: this game was made in one day! We will be updating it!

Update Notes

  1. Added Expert Level
  2. Fixed some bugs

Report any bugs you find!
